author: nurfikri89
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes AK4 and AK8 jet ID flag from NanoAOD. As the jet ID needs to be re-derived with the upcoming reMini+reNano, the available ID selections in NanoAOD gets outdated quickly. Analyzers will apply the jet ID selections on-the-fly and they can be applied from the jet constituent multiplicities and energy fractions. JME plans to provide a recipe to apply the jet ID through `correctionlib `.

#### PR validation:

- passes the usual runTheMatrix test: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`
- passes MiniAOD workflows: `runTheMatrix.py -i all --ibeos  -l 2500.021,2500.022,2500.023,2500.024,2500.031,2500.032,2500.033,2500.034`
title: [NanoAOD] Remove Jet ID
